amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for the administrative expenses of the Maritime Guaranteed Loan program by $10,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funds for administrative expenses for the Maritime Administration by $10,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
